title: Council Decision of 14 May 1996 appointing an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 14 May 1996
appointing an  alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training
(96/C  156/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 78/1028/EEC of 18 December 1978 setting up an Advisory Committee  on Veterinary Training  (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 25 March 1994  (2), the Council appointed Dr Augusto FERRAZZA as an  alternate member for the period ending 24 March 1997;
Whereas the Italian Government nominated Dr Gianluca FIORE to replace Dr Augusto FERRAZZA,
main_body: Dr Gianluca FIORE is hereby appointed an alternate member of the  Advisory Committee on Veterinary Training to replace Dr Augusto FERRAZZA, for the remainder of the  latter's term of office, i.e. until 24 March 1997.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 May 1996.
For the Council
The President
E. GUZZANTI
(1) OJ No L 362, 23.  12.  1978, p.  10.
(2) OJ No C 100, 9.  4.  1994, p. 1.
